data.title: Troma Film Series
authors: Contributors to List of Deaths Wiki
data.meta_description: Troma is an American independent film production and distribution company founded by Lloyd Kaufman and Michael Herz in 1974. The company produces low-budget independent films, primarily of the horror comedy genre. Many of them play on 1950s horror with elements of farce, parody, gore and...
data.text:
Troma is an American independent film production and distribution company founded by Lloyd Kaufman and Michael Herz in 1974. The company produces low-budget independent films, primarily of the horror comedy genre. Many of them play on 1950s horror with elements of farce, parody, gore and splatter.

Victims[]

TBA

Graduation Day (1981)[]

Laura Ramstead - Died from a blood clot.

Paula Brentwood - Throat slashed by Kevin with a knife.

Sally Prescott - Stabbed through the neck by Kevin with a sabre.

Ralph Johnson - Impaled by Kevin via a football tipped with a javelin.

Tony Fisk - Decapitated by Kevin with a sabre.

Diane Dolores - Sliced off-screen by Kevin with a sabre, later decapitated.

Pete McFarland - Impaled on a spike trap set up by Kevin.

Coach George Michael - Shot by Inspector Halliday.

Kevin Badger - Impaled against Pete's body.

Total - 9

The Toxic Avenger (1984)[]

Unnamed Bicycle Boy - Skull crushed underneath the tire of a car driven by Bozo, Slug, Wanda, and Julie.

Knuckles - Skull cracked open when Melvin Ferd Junko III/Toxie/The Toxic Avenger bashed his head against Nipples.

Nipples - Skull cracked open when Melvin Ferd Junko III/Toxie/The Toxic Avenger bashed his head against Knuckles.

Unnamed Male Mexican Restaurant Manager - Shot in the chest by Leroy with a shotgun.

Sara's Dog - Shot by Leroy with a shotgun.

Leroy - Mouth shredded by Melvin Ferd Junko III/Toxie/The Toxic Avenger with a milkshake stirrer.

Rico - Hands dissolved in a deep fryer by Melvin Ferd Junko III/Toxie/The Toxic Avenger.

Frank - Arm ripped off and then baked alive in an oven by Melvin Ferd Junko III/Toxie/The Toxic Avenger.

Unnamed Male Drug Dealer - Top of head crushed underneath weights dropped by Melvin Ferd Junko III/Toxie/The Toxic Avenger.

Wanda - Buttocks burned off on hot sauna rocks by Melvin Ferd Junko III/Toxie/The Toxic Avenger.

One of Cigar Face's Gang Members - Throat accidentally slit by another gang member with a knife when Melvin Ferd Junko III/Toxie/The Toxic Avenger ducked underneath it.

One of Cigar Face's Gang Members - Stabbed in the stomach by Melvin Ferd Junko III/Toxie/The Toxic Avenger with his own knife.

Cigar Face - Accidentally shot to death by his other gang members when Melvin Ferd Junko III/Toxie/The Toxic Avenger did parkour.

Five of Cigar Face's Gang Members - Accidentally shot each other when Melvin Ferd Junko III/Toxie/The Toxic Avenger did parkour.

Julie - Stabbed in the head by Melvin Ferd Junko III/Toxie/The Toxic Avenger with a pair of scissors off-screen.

Unnamed Elderly Woman - Beaten to death by Bozo and Slug with her own cane.

Slug - Thrown out of a car by Melvin Ferd Junko III/Toxie/The Toxic Avenger. (Debatable)

Three Unnamed People - Killed in a multi-car crash explosion caused by Melvin Ferd Junko III/Toxie/The Toxic Avenger and Bozo.

Bozo - Blown up when Melvin Ferd Junko III/Toxie/The Toxic Avenger caused him to drive off of a cliff.

Unnamed Slave Trader Woman - Killed by Melvin Ferd Junko III/Toxie/The Toxic Avenger putting her in a tumble dryer to break her bones and then crushing her in a steam press.

Mayor Belgroody - Disemboweled by Melvin Ferd Junko III/Toxie/The Toxic Avenger.

Total - 23

Klown Kamp Massacre (2010)[]

Valerie's Father - Shot in the chest by Valerie with a revolver in self defense during a flashback.

Unnamed Male Bonzo Ranch Worker - Framed by Bonzo and arrested for Valerie's Father's murder in a flashback. Most likely sentenced to death afterwards as the death penalty wasn't abolished in New Mexico, where the movie took place, until 2009.

Unknown Male Clown - Throat slit by Edwin the Clown with a knife.

Unknown Male Clown - Stabbed by Edwin the Clown off-camera in the abdomen/chest.

Unknown Male Clown - Stabbed by Edwin the Clown in the ear with a pencil off-screen, body shown.

Unknown Female Clown - Suffocated by Edwin the Clown with a rubber chicken shoved down her throat off-screen, body shown.

Unknown Male Clown - Stomach blown up by Edwin the Clown with an air pump off-screen, body shown.

Unknown Male Clown - Stabbed up through the chin and out the top of the head by Edwin the Clown with a sword off-screen, body shown.

Unknown Male/Female Clown - Cut in half by Edwin the Clown with a sliding door off-screen, body shown.

Unnamed Male Clown - Strangled by Edwin the Clown with balloon strings during a flashback.

Unnamed Male Clown - Head impaled by Edwin the Clown with a whipped cream spray can during a flashback.

Unnamed Female Clown - Stabbed in the stomach by Edwin the Clown with a clown horn during a flashback.

Edwin's Male Clown Roommate - Scalped by Edwin the Clown with a knife by and then forced to cannibalize pieces of his own brain.

Unnamed Female Hippy Clown - Head crushed against the window of Edwin the Clown's magic car as he was driving incredibly fast in small circles.

Tex - Stabbed in the back by Edwin the Clown with a hook and then shoved head first into grass packer.

Sergeant Thaddeus Funnybones The Third - Stabbed through the face by Edwin the Clown with a knife.

Bonzo - Neck snapped by Edwin the Clown and then hanged with a noose.

Squirts - Throat slit by Edwin the Clown with a knife.

Brandi - Decapitated by Edwin the Clown with a hatchet off-screen, body shown afterwards.

Tipsy - Killed by Edwin the Clown off-camera with a hatchet.

Vinnie - Face melted off by acid when Edwin the Clown switched it with a seltzer spray bottle, sprayed by Lenny (initially survived). Later accidentally stabbed in the chest by Edwin the Clown with a knife off-screen.

Lenny Boboski - Head blown up by Edwin the Clown with dynamite hidden in whipped cream pie.

Crazy Ernie - Mauled off-screen by a bear and then hit with a car by an unknown driver, possibly by Edwin the Clown.

Gerald - Head smashed seven times by Edwin the Clown with a high striker game mallet.

Butzer - Punched through the back and out his chest by Edwin the Clown, ripping his heart out.

Philbert - Run over by Edwin the Clown while he was hiding in a tree with his magic car.

Bananas - Neck snapped by Edwin the Clown.

Puff - Cut in half by Edwin the Clown with a saw while he was still alive.
